title: Lords of the Fallen - FitGirl
description:
Lords of the Fallen (v.1.6 + All DLCs + Bonus Content, MULTI13) [FitGirl Repack, 100% Lossless, Selective Download 5.8~6.1 GB]


::Information::


Release Date: October 28, 2014
Genres/Tags: Action RPG, Third-person, 3D
Developer: Deck13 Interactive, CI Games
Publisher: CI Games
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: in-house
Steam User Rating: 60% of user reviews are positive (based on 4,459 reviews)

Interface Language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
Audio Language: English, French, German
Crack: built-in (CPY)


::Repack Features::


Based on Lords.Of.The.Fallen-CPY ISO release: cpy-lotf.iso (18,574,176,256 bytes)
Game version is v1.6, the following DLCs added: Monk Decipher, Demonic Weapon Pack, The Foundation Boost, The Arcane Boost, Lion Heart Pack & Ancient Labyrinth
Bonus content added: Soundtrack (MP3), Artbook & Game Map
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 17.3 to 5.8~6.1 GB)
Selective Download feature: you can skip downloading/installing unnecessary bonus or language files
Installation takes 20-50 minutes (depending on number of your CPU cores & HDD speed)
After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
HDD space after installation: 17.5 GB (~24 GB during installation)
Repack by FitGirl
